name: Jelly Wants More
description: Jelly Wants More is a combination of first-class delusion and simple but catchy game mechanics. Relax, admire beautiful bodies and forget about problems!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
